title: 96/312/EC: Commission Decision of 22 April 1996 amending Decision 92/452/EEC establishing lists of embryo collection teams and embryo production teams approved in third countries for export of bovine embryos to the Community (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 22 April 1996 amending Decision 92/452/EEC establishing lists of embryo collection teams and embryo production teams approved in third countries for export of bovine embryos to the Community (Text with EEA relevance) (96/312/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In part 3 of the Annex to Decision 92/452/EEC, in respect of the United States of America:
(a) the following team is added:
>TABLE>
(b) the following teams are deleted:
>TABLE>
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 April 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 10. 10. 1989, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 53, 24. 2. 1994, p. 23.
(3) OJ No L 250, 29. 8. 1992, p. 40.
(4) OJ No L 23, 30. 1. 1996, p. 20.
